objects.name: Obtain domain/IP registration information
objects.description: For a computing resource to be accessible to the public, domain names and IP addresses must be registered with an authorized organization. (Citation: Google Domains WHOIS) (Citation: FunAndSun2012) (Citation: Scasny2015)

external_references.description: Google Domains. (n.d.). About WHOIS. Retrieved April 2, 2017.
Jeff Bardin. (2012, October 10). OSINT and Cyber Intelligence - Fun and Sun in Miami. Retrieved March 1, 2017.
Gregory Scasny. (2015, September 14). Understanding Open Source Intelligence (OSINT) and its relationship to Identity Theft. Retrieved March 1, 2017.

objects.x_mitre_detectable_by_common_defenses_ex: Open access to DNS registration/routing information is inherent in Internet architecture.
objects.x_mitre_difficulty_for_adversary_explana: Proliferation of DNS information makes registration information functionally freely available.
